abstract: Unable to agree on a chief executive, shareholders in TNK-BP on Wednesday appointed one of the Russian co-owners as interim chief.
snippet: Unable to agree on a chief executive, shareholders in TNK-BP on Wednesday appointed one of the Russian co-owners as interim chief.
lead_paragraph: Unable to agree on a chief executive, shareholders in TNK-BP on Wednesday appointed one of the Russian co-owners as interim chief, The New York Times’s Andrew E. Kramer reported from Moscow.

headline.main: Interim Chief Is Appointed at BP Venture in Russia
